entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 5 except 10 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 5 except 10 inland. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Showers beginning near midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023
